references.paper_title: Expansion of city scale, traffic modes, traffic congestion, and air pollution
references.reason: This paper provides background on the increasing traffic congestion and pollution problems in urban areas, motivating the need for improved traffic signal control (TSC) methods.

references.paper_title: Coordinated deep reinforcement learners for traffic light control
references.reason: This is an early and influential paper that demonstrated the effectiveness of deep reinforcement learning for TSC, laying the groundwork for many subsequent studies.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which form the foundation of the diffusion models used in the proposed DiffLight method.

references.paper_title: Planning with diffusion for flexible behavior synthesis
references.reason: This paper adapted diffusion models for reinforcement learning, addressing decision-making problems.  Its techniques are directly relevant to the DiffLight approach.

This paper introduced the Transformer architecture, which is a key component of the STFormer module in DiffLight, demonstrating its effectiveness in capturing long-range dependencies in sequential data.
